item.title: Setting up blogdown
item.description: Needing a site redesign, I spent several weeks (er, months?) fiddling with Skeleton and, later, Foundation off and on. Both great frameworks but, for me, there just weren’t enough hours in the day. Then, I spotted the following from Julia Silge. After about 10 minutes of fiddling with blogdown (and, apparently, thanking my lucky stars that I don’t have existing hmtl widgets), I committed the following: Seriously, blogdown is incredible.
